body.name: Paula's Choice SKIN RECOVERY Replenishing Facial Moisturizer Cream with Hyaluronic Acid, Soothes Redness & Sensitive Skin Prone to Rosacea & Eczema, Paraben-Free & Fragrance-Free, 2 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 7 hrs
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 19 hrs
features: THIS MOISTURIZER USES THE POWER OF ANTIOXIDANTS, emollients, anti-aging peptides, & skin quenching moisture to even out skin tone & minimize wrinkles. Calms, repairs & replenishes skin prone to redness and rosacea, while it fights the effects of aging.

Paula's Choice SKIN RECOVERY Replenishing Moisturizer Cream for Redness is a daily moisturizing treatment that hydrates and repairs without heaviness or residue. Use as part of your morning and night routine with your Paula's Choice cleanser and toner.

Restore your skin's natural radiance with plant-derived oils and antioxidants. Paula's Choice SKIN RECOVERY Replenishing Moisturizer Cream for Redness is formulated for normal to very dry skin. You'll notice smoother, brighter, more even skin right away.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whether your skin is dry, oily, combination, aging, acne or blemish-prone, sensitive, or dull; we've got a skincare solution for you. The search for amazing skincare ends here. Finally, you found it.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars for lotion, 1 star buying from Amazon
reviews.reviewText: This product is fantastic. I have rosacea, and this is the time of year I have to switch to a heavier nighttime moisturizer to combat the cold and dry Midwest weather.My first bottle arrived with shrink wrap, which I thought was odd because the listing promotes reducing waste and getting rid of shrink wrapping their products. I used it later that night, and there was something very off with the scent. It almost smelled like what I would expect self tanner to smell like if it went bad. I came back to the listing to see if anyone else complained about an unscented lotion smelling so gross, and I came across a couple of questions asking the same thing. Apparently that smell was not normal, so I requested a new one from Amazon.My new one arrived, not in shrink wrap, and with a large expiration date sticker on it. I tried it out immediately and the difference was night and day. I’m very glad I didn’t continue to use a spoiled moisturizer on my already extremely sensitive skin.TLDR: great moisturizer, especially for sensitive skin. Check product smell immediately if yours arrives in shrink wrap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is GREAT for combo oily/super dry and redness. When I stick to using it consistently it makes my skin look and feel amazing. I have very red and very dry cheeks (probs something undiagnosed) but after 2 weeks of using this once at night I saw massive improvements. A little bit of it goes a long way so it lasts for a while too. Love it, just ordered another bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey, but worth it
reviews.reviewText: I have dry skin. Most products agitate my skin and I get red and itchy. Not with this, and my skin feels so soft afterwards! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought this because it did not contain toxic ingredients
reviews.reviewText: It’s hard to give a review on a moisturizer, when it is used alongside other products in a three step routine. I usually wash my face with Cetaphil, and then misted my face with rosewater, then apply a hyaluronic acid serum, followed by a nighttime moisturizer. I tried PC moisturizer as my last step, and my skin stayed moist and supple until the next afternoon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a new face wash and heard good things about this brand. I like this face wash ok. I don’t really think there is anything special about it. It cleans my face, doesn’t cause breakouts, and moisturizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Now I’m talking the red bottle! I have very dry skin, which obviously leads to other problems. I have tried so many face lotions and nothing comes close to this! I used to use Vaseline as a last resort but this is even better. It does what it says, I’m a little inconsistent with using products at night but I use this every morning before I do my makeup and she’s worth every penny! If you have dry sensitive skin I would recommend at least giving it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Paula’s choice products have changed my skin for the better. Easy to use and reasonably priced

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worth a try
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is pretty good. I won’t say it’s the most moisturizing I’ve ever had though. My skin is super dry during the winter so I was looking for the holy grail that would moisturize but not irritate. My skin is prone to breakouts so I’m weary of new products. I’ve been using this for about 2 weeks and it has helped a bit with moisture but I’ve also had a couple breakouts on my jawline. Nothing crazy or anything though. That’s likely just my skin’s reaction to a new product. It feels really good initially and then after an hour or so is completely soaked in. Not necessarily in a bad way. It has no discernible scent which I like. I think it’s worth a try if you’re in the market for a good quality moisturizer. I just think results will vary person to person.
Skin is still very dry, didnt work at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 25, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Lovely cream, feels thick but a little goes a long way - super moisturising and soothing, definitely a new favourite for the end of my skincare routine especially after a vit A
This is a great moisturiser, non greasy, performs well on the skin. I recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 14, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This night time moisturiser is fantastic. Paul's Choice is a wonderful range.
I purchased one product from paulas choice, and now I have 4. I'm hooked! I'm a product junkie and this is probably my favourite new brand. Love this cream. Luxurious.
